channel.title: [562] A series of questions
channel.description:
Alright i need help with my 562 server, because it's alot different than a 317.
1.) How to make shops 2.) How to change exp rates 3.) How to change monster drops 4.) How to change prices
If anyone could answer these questions it would be great! Thanks!

item.title: [562] A series of questions
item.dc:creator: @jazzminerules jazzminerules
item.description:
@jazzminerules wrote:

Meh, Player.java for exp Item.xml I believe or items.xml for item prices (or ItemExaminer.xml I believe) npcDrops.xml

Read full topic
